content:
Hi, I am relatively new to FHIR, and was wondering what tutorials about the FHIR mapping language exist.
I have been trying to follow http://hl7.org/fhir/mapping-tutorial.html but have not found much success, so I am looking for other sources.
There are a few DevDays videos on youtube

As @Jose Costa Teixeira mentioned, there are a couple of DevDays videos which are helpful to get started. I also found the fhir-mapping-tutorial from ahdis (https://github.com/ahdis/fhir-mapping-tutorial) very helpful, since it helps to get a better feeling/understanding on the tutorials from http://hl7.org/fhir/mapping-tutorial.html . Try playing around with the maps, to get a better feeling on how they work.

@Corey Wen devdays video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q8F3Ae2_Qyw&list=PLKuZNI94tzWZ4zseQ2NLU7mLDdgmQlS5a&index=66 and https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mOflu1URYTM&list=PLKuZNI94tzWZ4zseQ2NLU7mLDdgmQlS5a&index=35 which i attended and I highly recommend, thanks @Alexander Zautke and @Vadim Peretokin
